segments.text: Are there pets allowed in this apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No dogs or cats or any other fur type animal , but other pets are allowed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . . . is that a pet ? Isn't that something from the zoo ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I had one , could I rent this apartment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was more thinking of nice little fish or frogs or turtles or a pet rock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll tell you what , if your pet can fit in this little box and doesn't have fur , it is welcome here .
segments.speaker: S2
